titleStmt.title: The essence and unitie of the Church Catholike visible, and the prioritie thereof in regard of particular churches discussed. / By Samuel Hudson minister of the Gospell.
titleStmt.author: Hudson, Samuel, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Miller for Christopher Meredith at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Churchyard.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 8th 1644"; the 5 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
